text: Cradle of Genius is a 1961 Irish short documentary film directed by Paul Rotha on the history of the Abbey Theatre. It was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==Cast== * Eileen Crowe * Maureen Delany * Barry Fitzgerald * Siobhán McKenna ==References== ==External links== * Category:1961 films Category:1961 documentary films Category:1961 short films Category:Irish films Category:English-language films Category:Irish documentary films Category:Irish black-and-white films Category:Irish short films Category:Films directed by Paul Rotha
title: Cradle of Genius
